title: Drawing, "Design for Ceiling and Four Walls of Room", 1815–22
medium: Pen and gray ink, brush and watercolor on off-white wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Vertical Rectangle: Ceiling center. Upper wall has console center, mirror above it. Right wall has windows either side of console with mirror above it. Lower wall has fireplace center, mirror above it. Left wall has decorated panel, doors to left and right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Ceiling and Four Walls of Room", 1815–22.
1815–22. Pen and gray ink, brush and watercolor on off-white wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1948-40-124.
